original_text:
Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax
Se amate l’Irlanda e credete che il quadrifoglio porti davvero fortuna, allora giocare a Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax è la scelta migliore che potete fare!
Una slot piena di colori
Se avete già giocato a Lucky Mushrooms e conoscete la meccanica DoubleMax di Yggdrasil, allora state certi che questa slot vi lascerà a bocca aperta. Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax, infatti, si basa su un gioco molto popolare della Reflex Gaming utilizzando però il meccanismo inventato dalla Yggdrasil, in un connubio davvero spettacolare. Prima di raccontare il gameplay, i numerosi Bonus presenti e le caratteristiche di questo gioco, vediamo da vicino come si presenta dal punto di vista grafico.
Come avrete capito ci troviamo in Irlanda, su una landa sterminata dietro cui è ben visibile l’arcobaleno. Dobbiamo dire che rispetto ad altri giochi la grafica non è eccelsa, ma comunque fa il suo dovere. I simboli di grandi dimensioni ci piacciono perché risaltano ed è più semplice capire quando si ottiene una combo vincente, i tasti posizionati fuori dalla schermata la troviamo una scelta azzeccata perché non intralciano le giocate. La musica d’accompagnamento è un mix di flauti rilassanti e suoni della natura, come lo scorrere del fiume e il cinguettio degli uccelli.
Caratteristiche di Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax
Appena si apre la schermata, accanto alla griglia di dimensioni 5×3 notiamo subito il numero delle linee di pagamento, 20 e fisse. Il costo di ogni Spin è di 0,20 €, scommessa che può essere innalzata a piacimento.
Come gran parte delle slot, anche Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax offre la possibilità di impostare i giri automatici, solo che qui è tassativo inserire dei limiti di perdita oltre i quali l’Autoplay si arresterà.
Si intendono combinazioni vincenti quelle composte da simboli identici che si sviluppano dal primo rullo a sinistra verso destra.
La volatilità è alta, mentre il ritorno teorico al giocatore RTP è pari al 95,5%.
Simboli e funzionalità
Diamo ora un’occhiata ai simboli e al sistema di bonus pensato dalla Reflex Gaming. I simboli regolari sono sette, con le carte da gioco a occupare il gradino più basso in una scala di valore. A salire troviamo il cilindro verde, i funghi e il logo del gioco.
Vediamo ora i simboli speciali, a partire dai Wild, che sono due: il primo è la pentola di monete d’oro e sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto gli altri speciali, il secondo è il quadrifoglio, un Wild a espansione che quando atterra si espande per l’intero rullo.
La fatina è il nostro Scatter e in base al numero di volte in cui compare, regala da 8 a 16 Free Spin che possono essere incrementati prima dell’inizio girando una ruota. Attenzione però, perché c’è anche la possibilità di perdere i giri gratuiti.
Durante i Free Spins i simboli del fungo assumono un valore monetario casuale, mentre i simboli della fata si trasformano in moltiplicatori.
Il pozzo è un altro simbolo Scatter: quando sui rulli ne atterrano 3, avremo la possibilità di vincere una somma relativamente alta.

Domande Frequenti 
È possibile provare Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax prima di scommettere soldi veri?

Certo, sul nostro sito è presente la versione Demo per giocare con moneta virtuale, quindi del tutto gratuita.
 



Posso giocare su qualsiasi dispositivo mobile?

Sì, essendo la tecnologia HTML5, questo gioco può girare sia su Android, sia su IOS.



Quante sono le linee di pagamento in Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax?

In questa slot le paylines sono 20, fisse.

raw_translation.response:
If you're a fan of the luck of the Irish and believe that a four-leaf clover brings true fortune, then playing Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax is the best choice you can make! Get ready to be blown away by this slot game full of colors and excitement.

With its beautiful graphics, this game will transport you to the endless green fields of Ireland, with the rainbow in clear sight. While the graphics might not be the absolute best, the large symbols make it easy to understand when you've won a combo and the buttons are placed outside the screen, so they won't get in the way of your gameplay. Accompanied by a mix of relaxing flutes and natural sounds such as flowing rivers and chirping birds, the music sets the perfect atmosphere for the game.

Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax features a 5x3 grid and 20 fixed paylines, with each spin costing €0,20, but the bet can be raised at will. Like many slot games, this one also offers the possibility of setting automatic spins, but with the requirement to set limits on losses, after which the Autoplay will stop.

The game's volatility is high, with the theoretical return to player (RTP) being 95.5%.

The regular symbols in the game include seven different ones, with the playing cards occupying the lowest position in the value scale, followed by the green cylinder, mushrooms, and the game's logo.

As for the special symbols, Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax features two Wilds: the first is the pot of gold coins, which substitutes all symbols except for the other special ones, and the second is the expanding Wild clover, which expands to cover the entire reel when it lands.

The fairy is the Scatter symbol and, depending on how many times it appears, will reward you with 8 to 16 Free Spins, which can be increased before starting the spins by spinning a wheel. However, be careful, because there is also a chance of losing the free spins.

During the Free Spins feature, mushroom symbols take on a random monetary value, while fairy symbols turn into multipliers.

The well is another Scatter symbol that, when three appear on the reels, gives you the chance to win a relatively high sum.

Experience the magic of Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax today, with a demo version available on our website for you to try out the game before betting with real money. Play this HTML5 game on any device, whether it be Android or iOS. With 20 fixed paylines, there are plenty of chances to win big in this exciting slot game.

raw_translation.response:
"Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax" Review

If you love Ireland and believe that a four-leaf clover brings real luck, then playing "Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax" is the best choice you can make!

A slot machine full of colors and exciting gameplay, "Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax" combines the popular Reflex Gaming mechanism with the Yggdrasil mechanism, creating a truly spectacular game. The graphics may not be top-notch compared to other games, but it gets the job done. The large-sized symbols make it easy to understand when you've won a combo, and the buttons positioned outside the screen are a smart choice.

When the screen opens, you'll notice the 20 fixed paylines on the 5x3 grid. The cost of each spin is 0.20 € but can be increased at your desire. Like most slots, "Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax" offers the option to set automatic spins, but it is mandatory to set loss limits in case autoplay needs to stop.

The volatility is high, and the theoretical return to player (RTP) is 95.5%. Winning combinations are made up of identical symbols that develop from the leftmost reel to the right.

The regular symbols include seven cards, where the lowest ranking card occupies the lowest value. The higher-ranking symbols include a green cylinder, mushrooms, and the game's logo. The special symbols include two Wilds; the first is the pot of gold coins that substitutes all symbols except other specials, while the second is the four-leaf clover, an expanding Wild when it lands and covers the entire reel.

The fairy is the Scatter, and by appearing a certain number of times, it can give you 8 to 16 free spins. During free spins, the mushroom symbols take on a random monetary value, while the fairy symbols transform into multipliers. 

The well is another Scatter symbol, and landing three of them on the reels gives you a chance to win a relatively high sum. 

Overall, "Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax" is an excellent game to play if you enjoy Irish-themed slots and high volatility. 

FAQ:
Can you try "Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax" before betting real money? 

Yes, our website has a Demo version to play with virtual coins, completely free.

Can you play on any mobile device? 

Yes, this game can run on both Android and iOS devices due to the HTML5 technology.

How many paylines are in "Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax"? 

There are 20 fixed paylines in this slot.

Below is a review for the slot game "Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax".

Please, rewrite the review in a neutral tone of voice. Write subsections covering only the following topics:

Gameplay

Review: If you're a fan of the luck of the Irish and believe that a four-leaf clover brings true fortune, then playing Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax is the best choice you can make! Get ready to be blown away by this slot game full of colors and excitement.

With its beautiful graphics, this game will transport you to the endless green fields of Ireland, with the rainbow in clear sight. While the graphics might not be the absolute best, the large symbols make it easy to understand when you've won a combo and the buttons are placed outside the screen, so they won't get in the way of your gameplay. Accompanied by a mix of relaxing flutes and natural sounds such as flowing rivers and chirping birds, the music sets the perfect atmosphere for the game.

Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax features a 5x3 grid and 20 fixed paylines, with each spin costing €0,20, but the bet can be raised at will. Like many slot games, this one also offers the possibility of setting automatic spins, but with the requirement to set limits on losses, after which the Autoplay will stop.

The game's volatility is high, with the theoretical return to player (RTP) being 95.5%.

The regular symbols in the game include seven different ones, with the playing cards occupying the lowest position in the value scale, followed by the green cylinder, mushrooms, and the game's logo.

As for the special symbols, Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax features two Wilds: the first is the pot of gold coins, which substitutes all symbols except for the other special ones, and the second is the expanding Wild clover, which expands to cover the entire reel when it lands.

The fairy is the Scatter symbol and, depending on how many times it appears, will reward you with 8 to 16 Free Spins, which can be increased before starting the spins by spinning a wheel. However, be careful, because there is also a chance of losing the free spins.

During the Free Spins feature, mushroom symbols take on a random monetary value, while fairy symbols turn into multipliers.

The well is another Scatter symbol that, when three appear on the reels, gives you the chance to win a relatively high sum.

Experience the magic of Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax today, with a demo version available on our website for you to try out the game before betting with real money. Play this HTML5 game on any device, whether it be Android or iOS. With 20 fixed paylines, there are plenty of chances to win big in this exciting slot game.

response.headline: Gameplay
response.content:
Get ready to spin your way to fortune with Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax, a slot game that packs a punch with its exciting gameplay and charming graphics. With a 5x3 grid and 20 fixed paylines, this game is easy to understand and offers countless opportunities to win big.

But don't let the simplicity of the game fool you - Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax also has a few tricks up its sleeves. The minimum bet per spin is €0,20, which might be a bit too steep for some players. However, if you're feeling lucky, the bet can be raised at will, giving you the chance to win even bigger prizes.

If you're the kind of player who likes to sit back and let the game do the work, Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax has got you covered. The game features an Autoplay function that allows you to set a certain number of automatic spins. However, be sure to set limits on your losses, as the Autoplay function will stop once you reach that limit. We wouldn't want to see you lose all your lucky mushrooms in one go!

And speaking of lucky mushrooms, keep an eye out for those little guys during gameplay. They're the game's Wild symbol, and they'll substitute for any other symbol on the reels, increasing your chances of hitting that lucky payout. But be careful not to eat them, or you might end up seeing some strange things!

Review:
 
Gameplay

Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax is a slot game with a 5x3 grid and 20 fixed paylines. The game offers automatic spins, but with the requirement to set limits on losses, after which the Autoplay will stop.

Graphics and Sound

The graphics of Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax are beautiful and transport you to the endless green fields of Ireland, with the rainbow in clear sight. The large symbols make it easy to understand when you've won a combo, and the buttons are placed outside the screen, so they won't get in the way of your gameplay. The music is a mix of relaxing flutes and natural sounds such as flowing rivers and chirping birds, setting the perfect atmosphere for the game.

Paylines and Bet Amounts

Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax has 20 fixed paylines, with each spin costing €0,20, but the bet can be raised at will. The regular symbols in the game include seven different ones, with the playing cards occupying the lowest position in the value scale, followed by the green cylinder, mushrooms, and the game's logo.

Volatility and RTP

The volatility of Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax is high, with the theoretical return to player (RTP) being 95.5%.

Demo Version and Device Compatibility

Double Lucky Mushrooms DoubleMax has a demo version available on our website for you to try out the game before betting with real money. The game is available on any device, whether it be Android or iOS.

faq.answer: There are two Wilds in the game: the pot of gold coins, which substitutes all symbols except for other special ones, and the expanding Wild clover, which expands to cover the entire reel when it lands.
